inclusion.criterion: mother volunteering to participate in the study
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: mother's openness to communication and cooperation
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: absence of breast trauma in mother (mastitis, abscess etc.)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: mother's milk analysis at least a week before without taking any medication
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: having body mass index at normal values (18.5 to 24.9) pre-pregnancy
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Having a condition that obstacle for breastfeeding (craniofacial abnormality such as cleft palate, cleft lip, paralysis of facial muscles)
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has history of acne and mild hirsutism, elevated testosterone levels, gradual enlargement of hands and feet, irregular menstrual cycle, nipple discharge, snoring, headache, subtle facial features of acromegaly and prognathism. Laboratory evaluation reveals IGF-1 of 968 ng/mL and random GH of 19.7 ng/mL.
